Attached is a simple ant task file with results from Ant 1.6.1 and 1.8.1.

Line1 is Chinese chars. It gets different result in propertyfile task in 1.8.1 and 1.6.1.

The result from Ant 1.6.1 is correct which does not have extra zero after \u. 
The result from Ant 1.8.1 is wrong and extra zero makes converting back to Chinese difficult.

By the way, the order of 2 lines in 1.8.1 is better than the result from 1.6.1.
